item.title: Report X-2024020840
item.description:
Report X-2024020840

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-28T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-25
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package discovered wet in morning and brought over to hazmat area. DescribePack: 1 can inside the package has been dented enough to leak out some liquid but not a lot. The plastic bag that surrounds each individual can was also ripped from when the can was dented. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: It was moved to the hazmat area without being put in a tote and left with no email about what happened, etc.

item.title: Report X-2024020837
item.description:
Report X-2024020837

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-28T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-25
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: CANS OF PAINT WERE DISCOVERED LEAKING. PACKAGE PLACED IN PLASTIC BIN WITH GLOVES AND TAKEN TO FUME HOOD. DescribePack: PAINT CAN DENTED. BOTH CANS COVERED WITH LEAKING PRIMER. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED IN PLASTIC BIN AND TAKEN TO FUME HOOD.
